sn35.205:1.4: Yadanatta tam ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya datthabbam …pe…

sn35.205:1.12: Yadanatta, tam ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya datthabbam.
